data.similar:
Compress::*, especially Compress::LZV1, Compress::LZF and
    Compress::Zlib.
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Since LZW will be free tommorow, and all. We have to rub it in the
    faces at UNiSYS!! Other than that, it's a strong compression
    algorithm that has lots of potential with light overhead. Also, it
    provides the same interface as most other Compress::* modules,
    promoting choice between them. The implementation itself is
    well-written, just needs some extra management built around it.
